restarter.partial_crash_warn: Del aptikto serverio nulužimo serveris persikraus uz 1 minutes
restarter.partial_crash_warn_discord: Dėl aptikto serverio nulūžimo **%{servername}** serveris persikraus už 1 minutės
restarter.schedule_warn: Serveris persikraus už %{smart_count} minutes. Prašome atsijungti. |||| Serveris persikraus už %{smart_count} minuciu. Prašome atsijungti.
restarter.schedule_warn_discord: **%{servername}** automatiškai persikraus už %{smart_count} minutės. |||| **%{servername}** automatiškai persikraus už %{smart_count} minučių.

ban_messages.kick_temporary: (%{author}) You have been banned from this server for "%{reason}". Your ban will expire in: %{expiration}.
ban_messages.kick_permanent: (%{author}) You have been permanently banned from this server for "%{reason}".
ban_messages.reject_temporary:
You have been banned from this server.
Your ban will expire in: %{expiration}.
Ban ID: %{id}.
Ban Reason: %{reason}.
Banned by: %{author}.
ban_messages.reject_permanent:
You have been permanently banned from this server.
Ban ID: %{id}.
Ban Reason: %{reason}.
Banned by: %{author}.

nui_warning.title: WARNING
nui_warning.instruction: Hold [SPACE] for 10 seconds to dismiss this message.
